Articles.Content:
<p><a href="http://bit.ly/1jwdoWR"><img src="https://31.media.tumblr.com/f45c416dd756609362b0450fcc271494/tumblr_inline_n6ef54TEGc1rr2wit.png"/></a></p>

<p>As a reminder to everyone who may have hosted material on <a href="http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/"><strong>SPACEPORT</strong></a>, this will be the last day of the site’s availability. If you haven’t backed up your work and found an alternate host for it, you must do so by end of day today (Squad time).<br/><br/>So what will happen onto the material that’s already on Spaceport if the creators haven’t been able to back it up themselves? Fear not - no content will be lost. Squad has backed up the entire contents of Spaceport and we are looking for ways to preserve the important work of our mod developers and community.<br/><br/>If you’re looking for a new mod host, we recommend making the switch to <a href="http://bit.ly/1jwdoWR"><strong>CURSE</strong></a>, our new official repository. New mods are being uploaded there each day and the staff has been quick to make improvements based on feedback from the community. It’s an experience we think you’ll be pleased with.</p>

<p></p>

Goodbye old friend.

Wait. Spaceports being backed up!

If it's backed up... where will it go?
It remains with us in spirit form on a hard drive somewhere. It's especially useful, should any of the mod creators suddenly realize they never backed anything up themselves. Just sayin'.

It's great news that it's being backed up! Thanks for doing this, I'm sure it will make a lot of modders that are sad to see SpacePort go will be happier!

Edited May 30, 2014 by Woopert
Yay! Touhou Torpedo's mods are not lost! Well since the spaceport content was not deleted like he expected, he may continue to support his add-ons!
Backed up by popular demand! See? Squad DOES listen to us!

Backed up by popular demand! See? Squad DOES listen to us!

Indeed.....

Just a heads up: the link to the Curse page if you go to kerbalspaceprogram.com directs to the Curse page with all the advertisements and download timers. It should be replaced with the link listed at the top of the forums.

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/projects
Annnnnnd it's gone.. RIP Spaceport. I still remember when it came out during that live stream.

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/ 404 - Not Found

Bye Spaceport Nostalgia...

Curse will be the new docking station.
